arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَن تُغْنِىَ عَنْهُمْ أَمْوَٰلُهُمْ وَلَآ أَوْلَـٰدُهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ شَيْـًۭٔا ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمْ وَقُودُ ٱلنَّارِ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 for	 those	 who	 disbelieve,	 neither	
their	 wealth	 nor	 their	 offspring	 will	 help	
to	save	them	in	the	least	from	Allah;	and	it	
is	they	who	are	fuel	for	the	fire.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	 woh	jo	 kāfir	 huwe	 un	 ke	māl	 aur	
unki	aulād	Allah	se	unheiñ	kuch	na	bacha	
sakeñge	aur	wohi	dozakh	ke	eeñdhan	haiñ

arabicText: كَدَأْبِ ءَالِ فِرْعَوْنَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبْلِهِمْ ۚ كَذَّبُوا۟ بِـَٔايَـٰتِنَا فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ شَدِيدُ ٱلْعِقَابِ
englishTranslationText:
Like	the	way	of	Firaun’s	people,	and	those	
before	 them;	 they	 denied	 Our	 signs;	 so	
Allah seized	 them	 because	 of	 their	 sins;	
and	Allah’s	punishment	is	severe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Jaise	 Fir'aun	 wāloñ	 aur	 un	 se	 agloñ	 ka	
tareeqa	 unhoñ	 ne	 hamāri	 āayatyeñ	
jhutlayiñ	 to	 Allah	 ne	 unke	 gunahoñ	 par	
unko	pakda	aur	Allah	ka	azāb	sakht

arabicText: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ سَتُغْلَبُونَ وَتُحْشَرُونَ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَ ۚ وَبِئْسَ ٱلْمِهَادُ
englishTranslationText:
Say	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	
and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	 to	 the	
disbelievers,	 “Very	 soon	 you	 shall	 be	
overcome	 and	 driven	 towards	 hell;	 and	
that	is	a	wretched	resting-place.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Farma	 do	 kāfiroñ	 se,	 koi	 dam	 jāta	 hai	 ke	
tum	 maghloob	 hoge	 aur	 dozakh	 ki	 taraf	
hāñke	 jao	 ge	 aur	 woh	 bahot	 hi	 bura	
bichhauna

arabicText: قَدْ كَانَ لَكُمْ ءَايَةٌۭ فِى فِئَتَيْنِ ٱلْتَقَتَا ۖ فِئَةٌۭ تُقَـٰتِلُ فِى سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَأُخْرَىٰ كَافِرَةٌۭ يَرَوْنَهُم مِّثْلَيْهِمْ رَأْىَ ٱلْعَيْنِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يُؤَيِّدُ بِنَصْرِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ ۗ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةًۭ لِّأُو۟لِى ٱلْأَبْصَـٰرِ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	there	was	a	sign	for	you	in	the	two	
groups	 that	clashed;	one	army	 fighting	in	
Allah's	 cause,	 against	 the	 other	 of	
disbelievers,	 whom	 they	 (the	 Muslims)	
saw	 with	 their	 eyes,	 as	 twice	 their	 own	
number;	 and	 Allah strengthens	 with	 His	
help	whomever	He	wills;	indeed	in	this	is	
a	lesson	for	the	intelligent,	to	be	learnt	by	
observing.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	 tumhāre	 liye	 nishāni	 thi	 do	
girohoñ	 meiñ	 jo	 āpas	 meiñ	 bhid	 pade	 ek	
jat-tha	(giroh)	Allah	ki	rāh	meiñ	ladta	aur	
doosra	 kāfir	 ke	 unheiñ	 ānkhoñ	 dekha	
apne	 se	 doona	 samjheiñ	 aur	 Allah	 apni	
madad	 se	 zor	 deta	 hai	 jise	 chāhta	 hai	
beshak	is	meiñ	aqalmandoñ	ke	liye	zaroor	
dekh	kar seekhna	hai

arabicText: زُيِّنَ لِلنَّاسِ حُبُّ ٱلشَّهَوَٰتِ مِنَ ٱلنِّسَآءِ وَٱلْبَنِينَ وَٱلْقَنَـٰطِيرِ ٱلْمُقَنطَرَةِ مِنَ ٱلذَّهَبِ وَٱلْفِضَّةِ وَٱلْخَيْلِ ٱلْمُسَوَّمَةِ وَٱلْأَنْعَـٰمِ وَٱلْحَرْثِ ۗ ذَٰلِكَ مَتَـٰعُ ٱلْحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنْيَا ۖ وَٱللَّهُ عِندَهُۥ حُسْنُ ٱلْمَـَٔابِ
englishTranslationText:
Beautified	is	for	mankind	the	love	of	these	
desires	- women,	 and	 sons,	 and	 heaps	 of	
gold	 and	 piled	 up	 silver,	 and	 branded	
horses,	 and	 cattle	 and	 fields;	 this	 is	 the	
wealth	 of	 the	 life	 of	 this	 world;	 and	 it	 is	
Allah,	with	Whom	is	the	excellent	abode
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Logoñ	 ke	 liye	 ārāsta	 ki	 gayi	 un	
khuwahishoñ	 ki	 muhabbat	 aurteiñ	 aur	
bete	aur	tale	upar	sone	chāndi	ke	dher	aur	
nishān	kiye	huwe	ghode	aur	chaupāye	aur	
kheti,	 yeh	 jeeti	 duniya	 ki	 pooñji	 hai	 aur	
Allah	hai	jiske	pās	achchha	thikana

arabicText: ۞ قُلْ أَؤُنَبِّئُكُم بِخَيْرٍۢ مِّن ذَٰلِكُمْ ۚ لِلَّذِينَ ٱتَّقَوْا۟ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّـٰتٌۭ تَجْرِى مِن تَحْتِهَا ٱلْأَنْهَـٰرُ خَـٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا وَأَزْوَٰجٌۭ مُّطَهَّرَةٌۭ وَرِضْوَٰنٌۭ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرٌۢ بِٱلْعِبَادِ
englishTranslationText:
Say	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him),	 “Shall	 I	 inform	 you	 of	
something	better	 than	 that?	For	 the	pious,	with	 their	Lord,	are	Gardens	beneath	which	rivers	
flow	- they	will	abide	in	it	 forever	- and	pure	wives,	and	Allah’s	pleasure”;	and	Allah sees	 the	
bondmen.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	farmao	kya	maiñ	tumheiñ	is	se	behtar	cheez	bata	dooñ	parhez-gāroñ	ke	liye	unke	Rab	ke	
pās	Jannateiñ	haiñ	jin	ke	neeche	nahre	rawāñ,	hamesha	un	meiñ	raheñge	aur	suthri	biwiyāñ	aur	
Allah	ki	khush-noodi	aur	Allah	bandoñ	ko	dekhta	hai

arabicText: ٱلَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَآ إِنَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا فَٱغْفِرْ لَنَا ذُنُوبَنَا وَقِنَا عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ
englishTranslationText:
Those	 who	 say,	 “Our	 Lord!	 we	 have	
accepted	 faith,	 so	 forgive	us	 our	 sins	and	
save	us	from	the	punishment	of	fire.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Woh	jo	kehte	haiñ	aey	Rab	hamāre!	Ham	
Imān	lāye	tu	hamāre	gunah	mu'āf	kar	aur	
hameiñ	dozakh	ke	ázāb	se	bacha	le

arabicText: ٱلصَّـٰبِرِينَ وَٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ وَٱلْقَـٰنِتِينَ وَٱلْمُنفِقِينَ وَٱلْمُسْتَغْفِرِينَ بِٱلْأَسْحَارِ
englishTranslationText:
The	 steadfast,	 and	 the	 truthful,	 and	 the	
reverent,	and	who	spend	in	Allah's	cause,	
and	 who	 seek	 forgiveness	 in	 the	 last	
hours	of	the	night	(before	dawn).
romanUrduTranslationText:
Sabr	wāle	aur	sachche	aur	adab	wāle	aur	
Rāh-e-Khuda	 meiñ	 kharchne	 	 wāle	 aur	
pichhle	pahar	se	mu'āfi	māñgne	wāle

arabicText: شَهِدَ ٱللَّهُ أَنَّهُۥ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ وَٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَأُو۟لُوا۟ ٱلْعِلْمِ قَآئِمًۢا بِٱلْقِسْطِ ۚ لَآ إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
Allah has	given	witness	that	there	is	none	
worthy	of	worship	(God)	except	Him	- and	
the	 angels	 and	 the	 scholars	 also	 give	
witness,	 established	 with	 justice	 (with	
truth)	 - there	 is	 no	 God	 except	 Him,	 the	
Almighty,	the	Wise.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Allah	 ne	 gawāhi	 di	 ke	 us	 ke	 siwa	 koi	
Ma'bood	nahi	aur	Farishtoñ	ne	aur	ālimoñ	
ne	insāf	se	qāyim	hokar,	us	ke	siwa	kisi	ki	
ibadat	nahi,	izzat	wāla	hikmat	wāla.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلدِّينَ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلْإِسْلَـٰمُ ۗ وَمَا ٱخْتَلَفَ ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَهُمُ ٱلْعِلْمُ بَغْيًۢا بَيْنَهُمْ ۗ وَمَن يَكْفُرْ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ سَرِيعُ ٱلْحِسَابِ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	 the	 only	 true	 religion	in	 the	 sight	
of	Allah is	 Islam;	 those	who	had	received	
the	 Books	 differed	 only	 after	 the	
knowledge	 came	 to	 them,	 due	 to	 their	
hearts’	 envy;	 and	 whoever	 disbelieves	 in	
the	 signs	 of	 Allah,	 then	 Allah is	 Swift	 At	
Taking	Account
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	 Allah	 ke	 yahāñ	 Islam	 hi	 deen	 hai	
aur	phoot	meiñ	na	pade	kitābi	magar	b’ad	
iske	 ke	 unheiñ	 ilm	 āchuka	 Apne	 diloñ	 ki	
jalan	se	aur	jo	Allah	ki	āayatoñ	ka	munkir	
ho	 to	 beshak	 Allah	 jald	 hisāb	 lene	 wāla	
hai.

arabicText: فَإِنْ حَآجُّوكَ فَقُلْ أَسْلَمْتُ وَجْهِىَ لِلَّهِ وَمَنِ ٱتَّبَعَنِ ۗ وَقُل لِّلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْأُمِّيِّـۧنَ ءَأَسْلَمْتُمْ ۚ فَإِنْ أَسْلَمُوا۟ فَقَدِ ٱهْتَدَوا۟ ۖ وَّإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَإِنَّمَا عَلَيْكَ ٱلْبَلَـٰغُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ بَصِيرٌۢ بِٱلْعِبَادِ
englishTranslationText:
Then	 if	 they	 argue	 with	 you,	 (O	 dear	
Prophet	Muhammad - peace	 and	 blessings	
be	 upon	 him)	 say,	 “I	 have	 submitted	 my	
face	(self)	to	Allah and	 likewise	 have	 my	
followers”;	 and	 say	 to	 the	 People	 given	
the	 Book(s)	 and	 the	 illiterate,	 “Have	 you	
submitted	(accepted	Islam)?”	If	they	submit,	they	have	attained	the	right	path	- and	if	they	turn	
away	(reject),	then	your	duty	is	only	to	convey	this	command;	and	Allah is	seeing	the	bondmen.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	aey	Mehboob agar	woh	tum	se	hujjat	
kareiñ	to	farma	do	maiñ	apna	muñh	Allah	ke	hozoor	jhukaye	hooñ	aur	jo	mere	pairo	huwe	aur	
kitābiyoñ	aur	an-padhoñ	se	farmao	kiya	tum	ne	gardan	rakhi	pas	agar	woh	gardan	rakheiñ	jab	
to	rāh	pa	gaye	aur	agar	mooñh	phereiñ	to	tum	par	to	yahi	hukm	pahoñcha	dena	hai	aur	Allah	
bandoñ	ko	dekh	raha	hai

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَكْفُرُونَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَقْتُلُونَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ بِغَيْرِ حَقٍّۢ وَيَقْتُلُونَ ٱلَّذِينَ يَأْمُرُونَ بِٱلْقِسْطِ مِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
englishTranslationText:
. Those	who	disbelieve	in	the	signs	of	Allah,	and	wrongfully	martyr	the	Prophets,	and	slay	people	
who	enjoin	justice	- so	give	them	the	glad	tidings	of	a	painful	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Woh	jo	Allah	ki	āayatoñ	se	munkir	hote	aur	paighambaroñ	ko	na-haq	shaheed	karte	aur	insāf	ka	
hukm	karne	wāloñ	ko	qatl	karte	haiñ	unheiñ	Khush	khabri	do	dard-nāk	azāb	ki

arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ حَبِطَتْ أَعْمَـٰلُهُمْ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّـٰصِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
They	are	those	whose	deeds	are	wasted	in	this	world	and	in	the	Hereafter;	and	they	do	not	have	
any	aides.
romanUrduTranslationText: Yeh	haiñ	woh	jin	ke	ámal	akārat	gaye	Duniya-o-Ākhirat	meiñ	aur	un	ka	koi	madad-gār	nahi

arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ حَبِطَتْ أَعْمَـٰلُهُمْ فِى ٱلدُّنْيَا وَٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّـٰصِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
They	are	those	whose	deeds	are	wasted	in	this	world	and	in	the	Hereafter;	and	they	do	not	have	
any	aides.
romanUrduTranslationText: Yeh	haiñ	woh	jin	ke	ámal	akārat	gaye	Duniya-o-Ākhirat	meiñ	aur	un	ka	koi	madad-gār	nahi

arabicText: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ نَصِيبًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ يُدْعَوْنَ إِلَىٰ كِتَـٰبِ ٱللَّهِ لِيَحْكُمَ بَيْنَهُمْ ثُمَّ يَتَوَلَّىٰ فَرِيقٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ وَهُم مُّعْرِضُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Did	you	not	see	them	who	have	received	a	
part	 of	 the	 Book	 - when	 called	 towards	
the	 Book	 of	 Allah for	 judging	 between	
them,	 a	 group	 of	 them	 opposes	 it	 and	
turns	away?
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Kya	tum	ne	unheiñ	na	dekha	jinheiñ	kitāb	
ka	ek	hissa	mila	Kitāb-Ullah ki	taraf	bulāye	
jāte	haiñ	ke	woh	unka	 faisla	kare	phir	un	
meiñ	 ka	 ek	 giroh	 us	 se	 ru-gardān	 hokar	
phir	jāta	hai

arabicText: أَلَمْ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ أُوتُوا۟ نَصِيبًۭا مِّنَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ يُدْعَوْنَ إِلَىٰ كِتَـٰبِ ٱللَّهِ لِيَحْكُمَ بَيْنَهُمْ ثُمَّ يَتَوَلَّىٰ فَرِيقٌۭ مِّنْهُمْ وَهُم مُّعْرِضُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Did	you	not	see	them	who	have	received	a	
part	 of	 the	 Book	 - when	 called	 towards	
the	 Book	 of	 Allah for	 judging	 between	
them,	 a	 group	 of	 them	 opposes	 it	 and	
turns	away?
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Kya	tum	ne	unheiñ	na	dekha	jinheiñ	kitāb	
ka	ek	hissa	mila	Kitāb-Ullah ki	taraf	bulāye	
jāte	haiñ	ke	woh	unka	 faisla	kare	phir	un	
meiñ	 ka	 ek	 giroh	 us	 se	 ru-gardān	 hokar	
phir	jāta	hai

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَالُوا۟ لَن تَمَسَّنَا ٱلنَّارُ إِلَّآ أَيَّامًۭا مَّعْدُودَٰتٍۢ ۖ وَغَرَّهُمْ فِى دِينِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَفْتَرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They	 dared	 to	 do	 this	 because	 they	 say,	
“The	 fire	 will	 definitely	 not	 touch	 us	
except	for	a	certain	number	of	days”;	and	
they	are	deceived	in	 their	 religion	by	 the	
lies	they	fabricated
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	jur'at	unheiñ	is	liye	huyi	ke	woh	kehte	
haiñ	hargiz	hameiñ	āg	na	chuwe	gi	magar	
ginti	ke	dinoñ	aur	un	ke	deen	meiñ	unheiñ	
fareb	diya	us	jhoot	ne	jo	bandh	te	they

arabicText: فَكَيْفَ إِذَا جَمَعْنَـٰهُمْ لِيَوْمٍۢ لَّا رَيْبَ فِيهِ وَوُفِّيَتْ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ مَّا كَسَبَتْ وَهُمْ لَا يُظْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
. So	 what	 will	 be	 (their	 state)	 when	 We	
bring	all	of	 them	 together	 for	 the	Day	(of	
Resurrection)	 about	 which	 there	 is	 no	
doubt;	and	every	soul	will	be	paid	back	in	
full	 for	 what	it	 has	 earned,	 and	 they	 will	
not	be	wronged.
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 kaisi	 hogi	 jab	 ham	 unheiñ	 ikhat-tha	
kareiñ	ge	us	din	ke	liye	jis	meiñ	shak	nahi	
aur	 har	 jān	 ko	 uski	 kamāi	 poori	 bhar	 di	
jāye	gi	aur	un	par	zulm	na	hoga

arabicText: قُلِ ٱللَّهُمَّ مَـٰلِكَ ٱلْمُلْكِ تُؤْتِى ٱلْمُلْكَ مَن تَشَآءُ وَتَنزِعُ ٱلْمُلْكَ مِمَّن تَشَآءُ وَتُعِزُّ مَن تَشَآءُ وَتُذِلُّ مَن تَشَآءُ ۖ بِيَدِكَ ٱلْخَيْرُ ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
. Invoke	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad -
peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him),	“O	Allah!	
Owner	Of	The	Kingdom	- You	bestow	 the	
kingdom	on	whomever	You	will,	and	You	
take	 back	 the	 kingdom	 from	 whomever	
You	 will;	 and	 You	 give	 honour	 to	
whomever	 You	 will,	 and	 You	 humiliate	
whomever	 You	 will;	 only	 in	 Your	 Hand	
(control)	lies	all	goodness;	indeed,	You	are	
Able	to	do	all	things.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Yuñ	arz	kar	aey	Allah	mulk	ke	Mālik	tu	jise	
chāhe	saltanat	de	aur	jis	se	chāhe	saltanat	
chheen	le	 aur	 jise	 chāhe	izzat	 de	 aur	 jise	
chāhe	 zillat	 de	 sāri	 hi	 bhalāi	 tere	 hi	 hāth	
hai	beshak	tu	sab	kuchh	kar	sakta	hai

arabicText: تُولِجُ ٱلَّيْلَ فِى ٱلنَّهَارِ وَتُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِى ٱلَّيْلِ ۖ وَتُخْرِجُ ٱلْحَىَّ مِنَ ٱلْمَيِّتِ وَتُخْرِجُ ٱلْمَيِّتَ مِنَ ٱلْحَىِّ ۖ وَتَرْزُقُ مَن تَشَآءُ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍۢ
englishTranslationText:
“You	 cause	 part	 of	 the	 night	 to	 pass	 into	
the	day,	and	You	cause	part	of	 the	day to	
pass	 into	 the	 night;	 and	 You	 bring	 forth	
the	 living	 from	 the	 dead,	 and	 You	 bring	 forth	 the	 dead	 from	 the	 living;	 and	 You	 give	 to	
whomever	You	will,	without	account.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Tu	 din	 ka	 hissa	 rāt	 meiñ	 dāle	 aur	 rāt	 ka	
hissa	 din	 meiñ	 dāle	 aur	 murda	 se	 zinda	
nikāle	 aur	 zinda	 se	murda	 nikāle	 aur	jise	
chāhe	be	ginti	de

arabicText: لَّا يَتَّخِذِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنُونَ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ أَوْلِيَآءَ مِن دُونِ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ ۖ وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ فَلَيْسَ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ فِى شَىْءٍ إِلَّآ أَن تَتَّقُوا۟ مِنْهُمْ تُقَىٰةًۭ ۗ وَيُحَذِّرُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسَهُۥ ۗ وَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلْمَصِيرُ
englishTranslationText:
The	Muslims	must	not	befriend	the	disbelievers,	in	preference	over	the	Muslims;	whoever	does	
that	has	no	connection	whatsoever	with	Allah,	except	if	you	fear	them;	Allah warns	you	of	His	
wrath;	and	towards	Allah only	is	the	return.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Musalman	 kāfiroñ	 ko	 apna	 dost	 na	 bana	
leiñ	 musalmanoñ	 ke	 siwa	 aur	 jo	 aisa	
karega	 usey	 Allah	 se	 kuchh	 alāqā	
(Ta’alluq) na	raha	magar	yeh	ke	tum	un	se	kuchh	daro	aur Allah	tumheiñ	apne	gazab	se	darata	
hai	aur	Allah	hi	ki	taraf	phirna	hai

arabicText: قُلْ إِن تُخْفُوا۟ مَا فِى صُدُورِكُمْ أَوْ تُبْدُوهُ يَعْلَمْهُ ٱللَّهُ ۗ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا فِى ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَمَا فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَىْءٍۢ قَدِيرٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Say,	(O	 dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him),	 “Whether	 you	 hide	 or	
reveal	 whatever	 is	 in your	 hearts,	 Allah knows	 it	 all;	 and	 He	 knows	 all	 whatever	 is	 in	 the	
heavens	and	all	whatever	is	in	the	earth;	and	Allah has	control	over	all	things.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farma	 do	 ke	agar	 tum	apne	ji	 ki	 bāt	 chupao	 ya	zāhir	 karo	Allah	 ko	 sab	ma'loom	 hai	aur	
jānta	hai	jo	kuchh	āasmanoñ	meiñ	hai	aur	jo	kuch	zameen	meiñ	hai	aur	har	cheez	par	Allah	ka	
qābu	hai

arabicText: يَوْمَ تَجِدُ كُلُّ نَفْسٍۢ مَّا عَمِلَتْ مِنْ خَيْرٍۢ مُّحْضَرًۭا وَمَا عَمِلَتْ مِن سُوٓءٍۢ تَوَدُّ لَوْ أَنَّ بَيْنَهَا وَبَيْنَهُۥٓ أَمَدًۢا بَعِيدًۭا ۗ وَيُحَذِّرُكُمُ ٱللَّهُ نَفْسَهُۥ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ رَءُوفٌۢ بِٱلْعِبَادِ
englishTranslationText:
On	 the	 Day	 when	 every	 soul	 will	 be	
confronted	 with	 all	 the	 good	 that	 it	 has	
done;	and	all	 the	evil	 that	it	has	done	- it	
will	 wish	 that	 perhaps	 there	 would	 have	
been	 a	 great	 distance	 between	 itself	 and	
the	 punishment;	 and	 Allah warns	 you	 of	
His	 punishment; and	 Allah is	 Most	
Compassionate	towards	His	bondmen.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Jis	din	har	jān	ne	jo	bhala	kām	kiya	hāzir	
payegi	aur	jo	bura	kām	kiya	ummid	karegi		
kash	mujh	meiñ	aur	is	meiñ	door	ka	 fāsla	
hota	 aur	 Allah	 tumheiñ	 apne	 ‘azāb	 se	
darata	 hai	 aur	 Allah	 bandoñ	 par	
meharbān	hai.

arabicText: يَقُلْ إِن كُنتُمْ تُحِبُّونَ ٱللَّهَ فَٱتَّبِعُونِى يُحْبِبْكُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَيَغْفِرْ لَكُمْ ذُنُوبَكُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ غَفُورٌۭ رَّحِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim,	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad -
peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him),	 “O	
mankind!	 If	 you	 love	 Allah,	 follow	 me	 -
Allah will	 love	 you	 and	 forgive	 you	 your	
sins”;	 and	 Allah is	 Oft	 Forgiving,	 Most	
Merciful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 Mehboob!	 Tum	 farma	 do	 ke	 logoñ!	
Agar	 Allah	 ko	 dost	 rakhte	 ho	 to	 mere	
farmā-bardār	 ho	 jāo	 Allah	 tumheiñ	 dost	
rakhega	 aur	 tumhare	 gunah	 bakhsh	 dega	
aur	Allah	bakhsh	ne	wāla	meharbān	hai

arabicText: قُلْ أَطِيعُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلرَّسُولَ ۖ فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Proclaim,	 “Obey	 Allah and	 the	 Noble	
Messenger”;	 so	 if	 they	 turn	 away	 - then	
Allah is	not	pleased	with	the	disbelievers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farma	 do	 ke	 hukm	 māno	 Allah	 aur	
Rasool	ka	phir	agar	woh	muñh	phereiñ	to	
Allah	ko	khush	nahi	āte	kāfir.

arabicText: ۞ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصْطَفَىٰٓ ءَادَمَ وَنُوحًۭا وَءَالَ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَءَالَ عِمْرَٰنَ عَلَى ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Indeed	Allah chose	Adam,	and	Nooh,	and	
the	 Family	 of	 Ibrahim,	 and	 the	 Family	 of	
Imran	over	the	creation.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	Allah	ne	chun	liya	Ãdam	aur	Nooh	
aur	Ibrāheem	ki	āl	aur	Imran	ki	āl	ko	sāre	
jahān	se

arabicText: ذُرِّيَّةًۢ بَعْضُهَا مِنۢ بَعْضٍۢ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	 ek	 nasl	 hai	 ek	 doosre	 se	 aur	 Allah	
sunta	jānta	hai	.

arabicText: إِذْ قَالَتِ ٱمْرَأَتُ عِمْرَٰنَ رَبِّ إِنِّى نَذَرْتُ لَكَ مَا فِى بَطْنِى مُحَرَّرًۭا فَتَقَبَّلْ مِنِّىٓ ۖ إِنَّكَ أَنتَ ٱلسَّمِيعُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
englishTranslationText:
(Remember)	When	the	wife	of	Imran	said,	
“My	 Lord!	 I	 pledge	 to	 you	 what	 is	 in	 my	
womb	- that	it	shall	be	dedicated	purely	in	
Your	service,	so	accept	it	from	me;	indeed	
You	 only	 are	 the	 All	 Hearing,	 the	 All	
Knowing.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Jab	Imran ki	biwi	ne	arz	ki	aey	Rab	mere!	
Maiñ	tere	liye	mannat	mānti	hooñ	jo	mere	
pet	 meiñ	 hai	 ke	 khālis	 teri	 hi	 khidmat	
meiñ	 rahe	 to	 tu	 mujh	 se	 qabool	 karle,	
beshak	tu	hi	hai	sunta	jānta.

arabicText: فَلَمَّا وَضَعَتْهَا قَالَتْ رَبِّ إِنِّى وَضَعْتُهَآ أُنثَىٰ وَٱللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا وَضَعَتْ وَلَيْسَ ٱلذَّكَرُ كَٱلْأُنثَىٰ ۖ وَإِنِّى سَمَّيْتُهَا مَرْيَمَ وَإِنِّىٓ أُعِيذُهَا بِكَ وَذُرِّيَّتَهَا مِنَ ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنِ ٱلرَّجِيمِ ٣٦
englishTranslationText:
. So	when	she	gave	birth	to	it,	she	said,	“My	Lord!	I	have	indeed	given	birth	to	a	girl!”	And	Allah
well	knows	what	she	gave	birth	to;	and	the	boy	she	had	prayed	 for	is	not	like	this	girl;	“And	I	
have	named	her	Maryam	and	I	give	her	and	her	offspring	in	Your	protection,	against	Satan	the	
outcast.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	jab	usey	janā,	boli	aey	Rab	mere	yeh	
to	maiñ	ne	ladki	jani	aur	Allah	ko	khoob	ma'loom	hai	jo	kuchh	woh	jani	aur	woh	ladka	jo	us	ne	
māñga	us	ladki	sa	nahi	aur	maiñ	ne	us	ka	nām	Maryam	rakha	āur	maiñ	usey	aur	uski	aulād	ko	
teri	panāh	meiñ	deti	hooñ	rāñde huwe	shaitān	se.

arabicText: فَتَقَبَّلَهَا رَبُّهَا بِقَبُولٍ حَسَنٍۢ وَأَنۢبَتَهَا نَبَاتًا حَسَنًۭا وَكَفَّلَهَا زَكَرِيَّا ۖ كُلَّمَا دَخَلَ عَلَيْهَا زَكَرِيَّا ٱلْمِحْرَابَ وَجَدَ عِندَهَا رِزْقًۭا ۖ قَالَ يَـٰمَرْيَمُ أَنَّىٰ لَكِ هَـٰذَا ۖ قَالَتْ هُوَ مِنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَرْزُقُ مَن يَشَآءُ بِغَيْرِ حِسَابٍ
englishTranslationText:
So	her	Lord	fully	accepted	her	(Maryam),	and	gave	her	an	excellent	development;	and	gave	her	
in	 Zakaria’s	guardianship;	whenever	 Zakaria	 visited	her	at	her	place	 of	prayer,	he	 found	new	
food	with	her;	he	said,	“O	Maryam!	From	where	did	this	come	to	you?”	She	answered,	“It	is	from	
Allah;	indeed	Allah gives	to	whomever	He	wills,	without	limit	account.”	(Miracles	occur	through	
the	friends	of	Allah.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	 usey	 us	 ke	 Rab	 ne	 achhi	 tarah	 qabool	 kiya	 aur	 usey	 achchha	 parwān	 chadhaya	 aur	 usey	
Zakariya ki	nigeh-bāni	meiñ	diya,	jab	Zakariya us	ke	pās	us	ki	namāz	padhne	ki	jagah	jāte	us	ke	
pās	naya	rizq	pāte	kaha:	aey	Maryam!	yeh	tere	pās	kahāñ	se	āaya	boleiñ	woh	Allah	ke	pās	se	hai,	
beshak	Allah	jise	chāhe	be	ginti	de

arabicText: هُنَالِكَ دَعَا زَكَرِيَّا رَبَّهُۥ ۖ قَالَ رَبِّ هَبْ لِى مِن لَّدُنكَ ذُرِّيَّةًۭ طَيِّبَةً ۖ إِنَّكَ سَمِيعُ ٱلدُّعَآءِ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	here	that	Zakaria	prayed	to	his	Lord;	
he	said,	“My	Lord!	Give	me	 from	Yourself	
a	righteous	child;	indeed	You	only	are	the	
Listener	Of	Prayer.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yahāñ	pukāra	Zakariya apne	Rab	ko,	bola:	
aey	Rab	mere!	Mujhe	apne	pās	se	de	suthri	
aulād	beshak	tu	hi	hai	dua	sun	ne	wāla

arabicText: فَنَادَتْهُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ وَهُوَ قَآئِمٌۭ يُصَلِّى فِى ٱلْمِحْرَابِ أَنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُبَشِّرُكَ بِيَحْيَىٰ مُصَدِّقًۢا بِكَلِمَةٍۢ مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ وَسَيِّدًۭا وَحَصُورًۭا وَنَبِيًّۭا مِّنَ ٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	the	angels	called	out	to	him	while	he	
was	standing,	offering	prayer	at	his	place	
of	 worship,	 “Indeed	 Allah gives	 you	 glad	
tidings	of	Yahya	(John),	who	will	confirm	a	
Word	 (or	 sign)	 from	 Allah,	 - a	 leader,	
always	refraining	from	women,	a	Prophet	
from	one	of	Our	devoted	ones.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. To	farishtoñ	ne	usey	āwaz	di	aur	woh	apni	
namāz	 ki	 jagah	 khada	Namāz	 pardh	 raha	
tha	 beshak	 Allah	 āpko	 muzda	 deta	 hai	
Yahya	 ka	jo	 Allah ki	 taraf	 ke	 ek	 kalime	 ki	
tasdeeq	karega	aur	sardār	aur	hamesha	ke	
liye	 aurtoñ	 se	 bachne	 wāla	 aur	 Nabi	
hamāre	khāsoñ	me	se

arabicText: قَالَ رَبِّ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِى غُلَـٰمٌۭ وَقَدْ بَلَغَنِىَ ٱلْكِبَرُ وَٱمْرَأَتِى عَاقِرٌۭ ۖ قَالَ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱللَّهُ يَفْعَلُ مَا يَشَآءُ
englishTranslationText:
He	 said,	 “My	 Lord!	How	 can	 I	 have	a	 son	
when	old	age	has	reached	me	and	my	wife	
is	 barren?”	 He	 said,	 “This	 is	 how	 Allah
brings	about,	whatever	He	wills.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Bola	 aey	 mere	 Rab!	 Mere	 ladka	 kahāñ	 se	
hoga	 mujhe	 to	 pahuñch	 gya	 budhapa	 aur	
meri	 aurat	 bāñjh	 farmāya	 Allah	 yooñ	 hi	
karta	hai	jo	chāhe

arabicText: قَالَ رَبِّ ٱجْعَل لِّىٓ ءَايَةًۭ ۖ قَالَ ءَايَتُكَ أَلَّا تُكَلِّمَ ٱلنَّاسَ ثَلَـٰثَةَ أَيَّامٍ إِلَّا رَمْزًۭا ۗ وَٱذْكُر رَّبَّكَ كَثِيرًۭا وَسَبِّحْ بِٱلْعَشِىِّ وَٱلْإِبْكَـٰرِ
englishTranslationText:
He	 said,	 “My	 Lord!	 Determine	 a	 sign	 for	
me”;	 He	 said,	 “The	 sign	 is	 that	 you	 shall	
not	be	able	to	speak	to	mankind	for	three	
days	except	by	signs;	and	remember	your	
Lord	 profusely,	 and	 proclaim	 His	 Purity	
before	sunset	and	at	dawn.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Arz	ki	aey	mere	Rab!	Mere	liye	koi	nishāni	
karde	farmaya	teri	nishāni	yeh	hai	ke	teen	
din	tu	logoñ	se	bāt	na	kare	magar	ishāre	se	
aur	 apne	 Rab	 ki	 bahut	 yād	 kar	 aur	 kuchh	
din	 rahe (sham) aur	 tadke (subah) uski	
pāki	bol.

arabicText: وَإِذْ قَالَتِ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ يَـٰمَرْيَمُ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصْطَفَىٰكِ وَطَهَّرَكِ وَٱصْطَفَىٰكِ عَلَىٰ نِسَآءِ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 when	 the	 angels	 said,	 “O	 Maryam!	
Indeed	Allah has	chosen	you	and	purified	
you,	and	 has	 this	 day,	 chosen	 you	among	
all	the	women	of	the	world.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	 jab	 Farishtoñ	 ne	 kaha	 aey	 Maryam!	
beshak	Allah	ne	tujhe	chun	liya	aur	khoob	
suthra	 kiya	 aur	 āj	 sāre	jahān	 ki	 aurtoñ	 se	
tujhe	pasand	kiya

arabicText: يَـٰمَرْيَمُ ٱقْنُتِى لِرَبِّكِ وَٱسْجُدِى وَٱرْكَعِى مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ
englishTranslationText:
. “O	 Maryam!	 Stand	 in	 reverence	 before	
your	 Lord,	 prostrate yourself	 and	 bow	
along	with	those	who	bow.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aey	Maryam!	Apne	rab	ke	huzoor	adab	se	khadi	ho	aur	uske	liye	sajda	kar	aur	ruku'	wāloñ	ke	
sāth	ruku'	kar

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلْغَيْبِ نُوحِيهِ إِلَيْكَ ۚ وَمَا كُنتَ لَدَيْهِمْ إِذْ يُلْقُونَ أَقْلَـٰمَهُمْ أَيُّهُمْ يَكْفُلُ مَرْيَمَ وَمَا كُنتَ لَدَيْهِمْ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
These	are	tidings	of	the	hidden,	which	We	secretly	reveal	to	you	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad -
peace	and	blessings	be	upon	him);	and	you	were	not	present	with	them	when	they	threw	their	
pens	to	draw	lots,	to	know	who	should	be	the	guardian	of	Maryam;	nor	were	you	present	with	
them	when	they	were	quarrelling.	(Yet	you	know	of	these	things	- this	is	a	proof	of	your	being	a	
Prophet.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Yeh	ghaib	ki	khabreiñ	haiñ	ke	hum	khufiya	taur	par	tumheiñ	batate	haiñ	aur	tum	unke	pās	na	
they	jab	woh	apni	qalamoñ	se	qur'a	dālte	they	ke	Maryam kis	ki	parwarish	meiñ	raheñ	aur	tum	
unke	pās	na	they	jab	woh	jhagad	rahe	they

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلْغَيْبِ نُوحِيهِ إِلَيْكَ ۚ وَمَا كُنتَ لَدَيْهِمْ إِذْ يُلْقُونَ أَقْلَـٰمَهُمْ أَيُّهُمْ يَكْفُلُ مَرْيَمَ وَمَا كُنتَ لَدَيْهِمْ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	remember	when	the	angels	said,	“O	Maryam!	Allah gives	you	glad	tidings	of	a	Word	from	
Him,	whose	name	is	the	Messiah,	Eisa	the	son	of	Maryam	- he	will	be	honourable	in	this	world	
and	in	the	Hereafter,	and	among	the	close	ones	(to	Allah).”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yād	karo	jab	Farishtoñ	ne	Maryam se	kaha:	aey	Maryam!	Allah	tujhe	bashārat	deta	hai	apne	
pās	se	ek	kalime	ki	jis	ka	nām	hai	Maseeh	Īsa Maryam ka	beta	roodār	hoga	duniya	aur	Ākhirat	
meiñ	aur	qurb	wāla

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ مِنْ أَنۢبَآءِ ٱلْغَيْبِ نُوحِيهِ إِلَيْكَ ۚ وَمَا كُنتَ لَدَيْهِمْ إِذْ يُلْقُونَ أَقْلَـٰمَهُمْ أَيُّهُمْ يَكْفُلُ مَرْيَمَ وَمَا كُنتَ لَدَيْهِمْ إِذْ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“He	will	speak	to	people	while	he	is	in	the	
cradle	and	in	his	adulthood,	and	will	be	of	
the	devoted	ones.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	 logoñ	 se	 bāt	 karega	 pālne	 (Jhoole)	
meiñ	 aur	 pakki	 umr	 meiñ	 aur	 khāsoñ	
meiñ	hoga

arabicText: قَالَتْ رَبِّ أَنَّىٰ يَكُونُ لِى وَلَدٌۭ وَلَمْ يَمْسَسْنِى بَشَرٌۭ ۖ قَالَ كَذَٰلِكِ ٱللَّهُ يَخْلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُ ۚ إِذَا قَضَىٰٓ أَمْرًۭا فَإِنَّمَا يَقُولُ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
englishTranslationText:
She	said,	“My	Lord!	How	can	I	bear	a	child	
when	 no	 man	 has	 ever	 touched	 me?”	 He	
said,	 “This	is	how	Allah creates	whatever	
He	 wills;	 when	 He	 wills	 a thing,	 He	 only	
says	 to	 it,	 ‘Be’	 - and	 it	 happens	
immediately.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Boli	aey	mere	Rab	mere	bachcha	kahāñ	se	
hoga	 mujhe	 to	 kisi	 shakhs	 ne	 hāth	 na	
lagāya	 farmāya	 Allah	 yooñ	 hi	 paida	 karta	
hai	jo	chāhe	jab	kisi	kām	ka	hukm	farmāye	
to	us	se	yehi	kehta	hai	ke	hoja	woh	fauran	
ho	jāta	hai.

arabicText: وَيُعَلِّمُهُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْحِكْمَةَ وَٱلتَّوْرَىٰةَ وَٱلْإِنجِيلَ
englishTranslationText:
“And	 Allah will	 teach	 him	 the	 Book	 and	
wisdom,	 and	 the	 Taurat	(Torah)	 and	 the	
Injeel	(Bible).”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Allah	 usey	 sikhāye	 ga	 kitāb	 aur	
hikmat	aur	Taurāt aur	Injeel.

arabicText: وَرَسُولًا إِلَىٰ بَنِىٓ إِسْرَٰٓءِيلَ أَنِّى قَدْ جِئْتُكُم بِـَٔايَةٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ ۖ أَنِّىٓ أَخْلُقُ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلطِّينِ كَهَيْـَٔةِ ٱلطَّيْرِ فَأَنفُخُ فِيهِ فَيَكُونُ طَيْرًۢا بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَأُبْرِئُ ٱلْأَكْمَهَ وَٱلْأَبْرَصَ وَأُحْىِ ٱلْمَوْتَىٰ بِإِذْنِ ٱللَّهِ ۖ وَأُنَبِّئُكُم بِمَا تَأْكُلُونَ وَمَا تَدَّخِرُونَ فِى بُيُوتِكُمْ ۚ إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةًۭ لَّكُمْ إِن كُنتُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“And	 he	 will	 be	 a	 Noble	 Messenger	
towards	the	Descendants	of	Israel	saying,	
‘I	have	come	to	you with	a	sign	from	your	
Lord,	 for	 I	 mould	 a	 birdlike	 sculpture	
from	clay	for	you,	and	I	blow	into	it	and	it	
instantly	 becomes	 a	 (living)	 bird,	 by	
Allah’s	command;	and	I	heal	him	who	was	
born	blind,	and	the	leper,	and	I	revive	the	
dead,	 by	Allah’s	 command;	 and	 I	 tell	 you	
what	 you	eat	and	what	 you	store	in	 your	
houses;	undoubtedly	in	these	(miracles)	is	
a	great	sign	 for	 you,	if	 you	are	believers.’	
(Several	miracles	bestowed	to	Prophet	Eisa	
are	mentioned	here.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 Rasool	 hoga	 bani	 Isra’il	 ki	 taraf	 yeh	
farmāta	 huwa	 ke	 maiñ	 tumhāre	 pās	 ek	
nishāni	lāya	hooñ	tumhāre	Rab	ki	taraf	se	
ke	maiñ	tumhāre	liye	mitti	se	parind	ki	si	
moorat	banāta	hooñ	phir	us	meiñ	phoonk	
mārta	 hooñ	 to	 woh	 fauran	 parind	 ho	 jāti	
hai	Allah	ke	hukm	se	aur	maiñ	Shifa	deta	
hooñ	 mādar	 zāt	 andhe	 aur	 safed	 dāgh	
wāle	 ko	 aur	 maiñ	 murde	 jilāta	 (zinda	
karta)	hooñ	Allah	ke	hukm	se	aur	tumheiñ	
batata	 hooñ	 jo	 tum	 khāte	 aur	 jo	 apne	
gharoñ	 meiñ	 jama	 kar	 ke	 rakhte	 ho	
beshak	 in	 bātoñ	 meiñ	 tumhāre	 liye	 badi	
nishāni	hai	agar	tum	Imān	rakhte	ho

arabicText: وَمُصَدِّقًۭا لِّمَا بَيْنَ يَدَىَّ مِنَ ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةِ وَلِأُحِلَّ لَكُم بَعْضَ ٱلَّذِى حُرِّمَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۚ وَجِئْتُكُم بِـَٔايَةٍۢ مِّن رَّبِّكُمْ فَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
englishTranslationText:
‘And	 I	 come	 confirming	 the	 Taurat	
(Torah)	 - the	 Book	 before	 me	 - and	 to	 make	 lawful	 for	 you	 some	 of	 the	 things	 which	 were	
forbidden	to	you,	and	I	have	come	to	you	with	a	sign	from	your	Lord	- therefore	fear	Allah and	
obey	me.’
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 tasdeeq	karta	āaya	hooñ	apne	se	pahli	Kitāb	Taurāt ki	aur	is	liye	ke	halāl	karoñ	 tumhāre	
liye	kuch	woh	cheezeiñ	jo	tum	par	harām	theiñ	aur	maiñ	tumhāre	pās	tumhāre	Rab	ki	taraf	se	
nishāni	lāya	hoon,	to	Allah	se	daro	aur	mera	hukm	māno

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَبِّى وَرَبُّكُمْ فَٱعْبُدُوهُ ۗ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌۭ مُّسْتَقِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Undoubtedly	Allah is	the	Lord	of	all	- mine	and	yours	- so	worship	Him	only; this	is	the	Straight	
Path.’	”
romanUrduTranslationText: . Beshak	mera	tumhara	sab	ka	Rab	Allah	hai	to	usi	ko	poojo	yeh	hai	seedha	rāsta	.

arabicText: ۞ فَلَمَّآ أَحَسَّ عِيسَىٰ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْكُفْرَ قَالَ مَنْ أَنصَارِىٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِ ۖ قَالَ ٱلْحَوَارِيُّونَ نَحْنُ أَنصَارُ ٱللَّهِ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَٱشْهَدْ بِأَنَّا مُسْلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
So	when	 Eisa	 sensed	 their	 disbelief	 he	 said,	 “Who	will	 be	my	 aides	 towards	(in	 the	 cause	 of)	
Allah?”	The	disciples	said,	“We	are	the	aides	of	Allah’s	religion;	we	believe	in	Allah,	and	you	bear	
witness	that	we	are	Muslims.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Phir	jab	Īsa	ne	unse	kufr	pāya	bola	kaun	mere	madad-gār	hote	haiñ	Allah	ki	taraf	hawāriyoñ	ne	
kaha	ham	Deen-e-Khuda ke	madad-gār	haiñ	ham	Allah	par	Imān	lāye	aur	āp	gawah	ho	jāyeñ	ke	
ham	Musalman	haiñ

arabicText: رَبَّنَآ ءَامَنَّا بِمَآ أَنزَلْتَ وَٱتَّبَعْنَا ٱلرَّسُولَ فَٱكْتُبْنَا مَعَ ٱلشَّـٰهِدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
“Our	Lord!	We	have	believed	in	what	You	
have	 sent	 down	and	we	 follow	 the	Noble	
Messenger,	therefore	record	us	among	the	
witnesses	of	the	truth.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Rab	hamāre	hum	us	par	Imān	lāye	jo	
tu	 ne	 utāra	 aur	 Rasool	 ke	 tābe'	 huwe	 tu	
hameiñ	haq	par	gawāhi	dene	wāloñ	meiñ	
likh	le.

arabicText: وَمَكَرُوا۟ وَمَكَرَ ٱللَّهُ ۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيْرُ ٱلْمَـٰكِرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 the	 disbelievers	 conspired	 (to	 kill	
Eisa	 ),	 and	 Allah covertly	 planned	 to	
destroy	 them;	 and	 Allah is	 the	 best	 of	
secret	planners.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	kāfiroñ	ne	makr	kiya	aur	Allah	ne	un	
ke	 halāk	 ki	 khufiya	 tadbeer	 farmāyi	 aur	
Allah	sab	se	behtar	chupi	tadbeer	wāla	hai

arabicText: إِذْ قَالَ ٱللَّهُ يَـٰعِيسَىٰٓ إِنِّى مُتَوَفِّيكَ وَرَافِعُكَ إِلَىَّ وَمُطَهِّرُكَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَجَاعِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوكَ فَوْقَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَىَّ مَرْجِعُكُمْ فَأَحْكُمُ بَيْنَكُمْ فِيمَا كُنتُمْ فِيهِ تَخْتَلِفُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Remember	when	Allah said,	“O	Eisa!	I	will	
keep	you	alive	till	your	 full	age,	and	raise	
you	 towards	 Me,	 and	 cleanse	 you	 of	 the	
disbelievers	 and	 give	 your	 followers	
dominance	over	the	disbelievers	until	the	
Day	 of	 Resurrection;	 then	 you	 will	 all	
return	to	Me,	so	I	shall	judge	between	you	
concerning	 the	 matter	 in	 which	 you	
dispute.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yād	 karo	 jab	 Allah	 ne	 farmāya	 aey	 Īsa!	
maiñ	 tujhe	 poori	 umr	 tak	 pahuñchaoñga	
aur	tujhe	apni	taraf	utha	looñga	aur	tujhe	
kāfiroñ	 se	 pāk	 kar	 dooñga	 aur	 tere	
pairawoñ	 ko	 qiyamat	 tak	 tere	 munkiroñ	
par	ghalba	dooñga	phir	tum	sab	meri	taraf	
palat	 kar	 āoge	 to	 maiñ	 tum	 meiñ	 faisla	
farma	dooñga	jis	bāt	meiñ	jhagadte	ho	.

arabicText: إِذْ قَالَ ٱللَّهُ يَـٰعِيسَىٰٓ إِنِّى مُتَوَفِّيكَ وَرَافِعُكَ إِلَىَّ وَمُطَهِّرُكَ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ وَجَاعِلُ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوكَ فَوْقَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓا۟ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ ۖ ثُمَّ إِلَىَّ مَرْجِعُكُمْ فَأَحْكُمُ بَيْنَكُمْ فِيمَا كُنتُمْ فِيهِ تَخْتَلِفُونَ
englishTranslationText:
“So	 I	 shall	 mete	 a	 severe	 punishment	 to	
those	who	disbelieve,	in	this	world	and	in	
the	Hereafter;	and they	will	not	have	any	
supporters.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
To	woh jo	kāfir	huwe	maiñ	unheiñ	duniya	
o	ākhirat	meiñ	sakht	‘azāb	karuñga	aur	un	
ka	koi	madad-gār	na	hoga

arabicText: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَيُوَفِّيهِمْ أُجُورَهُمْ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلظَّـٰلِمِينَ`
englishTranslationText:
“And	for	those	who	believed	and	did	good	
deeds,	 Allah will	 give	 them	 their	 full	
reward;	 and	 Allah does	 not	 like	 the	
unjust.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	woh	jo	Imān	lāye	aur	achche	kām	kiye	
Allah	 unka	 neg (Ájr) unheiñ	 bharpoor	
dega	aur	zālim	Allah	ko	nahi	bhāte.

arabicText: ذَٰلِكَ نَتْلُوهُ عَلَيْكَ مِنَ ٱلْـَٔايَـٰتِ وَٱلذِّكْرِ ٱلْحَكِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
“And	for	those	who	believed	and	did	good	
These	 are	 some	 verses	 that	We	 recite	 to	
you,	and	advice	full	of	wisdom.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yeh	 ham	 tum	 par	 padhte	 haiñ	 kuch	
Āyatyeñ	aur	hikmat	wāli	nasihat

arabicText: إِنَّ مَثَلَ عِيسَىٰ عِندَ ٱللَّهِ كَمَثَلِ ءَادَمَ ۖ خَلَقَهُۥ مِن تُرَابٍۢ ثُمَّ قَالَ لَهُۥ كُن فَيَكُونُ
englishTranslationText:
The	example	of	Eisa	with	Allah is	like	that	of	Adam;	He	created	him	(Adam)	from	clay	and	then	
said	to	him,	“Be”	- and	it	thereupon	happens!
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Īsa ki	kahāwat	Allah	ke	nazdeek	Ādam ki	tarah	hai	usey	mitti	se	banaya	phir	farmāya	ho	ja	woh	
fauran	ho	jāta	hai	.

arabicText: ٱلْحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْمُمْتَرِينَ
englishTranslationText:
O	listener!	(followers	of	this	Prophet)	This	is	the	Truth	from	your	Lord,	so	never	be	of	those	who	
doubt.
romanUrduTranslationText: . Aey	sun	ne	wāle!	yeh	tere	Rab	ki	taraf	se	haq	[hai]	tu	shak	wāloñ	meiñ	na	hona

arabicText: فَمَنْ حَآجَّكَ فِيهِ مِنۢ بَعْدِ مَا جَآءَكَ مِنَ ٱلْعِلْمِ فَقُلْ تَعَالَوْا۟ نَدْعُ أَبْنَآءَنَا وَأَبْنَآءَكُمْ وَنِسَآءَنَا وَنِسَآءَكُمْ وَأَنفُسَنَا وَأَنفُسَكُمْ ثُمَّ نَبْتَهِلْ فَنَجْعَل لَّعْنَتَ ٱللَّهِ عَلَى ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Therefore	say	to	those	who	dispute	with	you	(O	dear	Prophet	Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	
be	upon	him)	concerning	Eisa	after	the	knowledge	has	come	to	you,	“Come!	Let	us	summon	our	
sons	and	your	sons,	and	our	women	and	your	women,	and	ourselves	and	yourselves	- then	pray	
humbly,	 thereby	 casting	 the	 curse	 of	Allah upon	 the	liars!”	(The	 Christians	 did	 not	 accept	 this	
challenge.)
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Phir	aey	Mehboob!	Jo	tum	se Īsa ke	bāre	mein	hujjat	kareiñ	b’ad	iske	ke	tumheiñ	ilm	āchuka	to	
un	se	farma	do	āao	ham	tum	balāyeiñ	apne	bete	aur	tumhāre	bete	aur	apni	aurteiñ	aur	tumhāri	
aurteiñ	aur	apni	jāneiñ	aur	tumhāri	jāneiñ	phir	mubahela	kareiñ	to	jhootoñ	par	Allah	ki	la'nat	
dāleiñ

arabicText: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ ٱلْقَصَصُ ٱلْحَقُّ ۚ وَمَا مِنْ إِلَـٰهٍ إِلَّا ٱللَّهُ ۚ وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Yehi	 beshak	 sachcha	 bayān	 hai	 aur	 Allah	
ke	 siwa	 koi	 Ma'bood	 nahi	 aur	 beshak	
Allah	hi	ghalib	hai	hikmat	wāla.

arabicText: فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلْمُفْسِدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
So	 if	 they	 turn	 away,	 then	 indeed	 Allah
knows	those	who	cause	turmoil.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Phir	 agar	 woh	 muñh	 phereiñ	 to	 Allah	
fasādiyoñ	ko	jānta	hai.

arabicText: قُلْ يَـٰٓأَهْلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ تَعَالَوْا۟ إِلَىٰ كَلِمَةٍۢ سَوَآءٍۭ بَيْنَنَا وَبَيْنَكُمْ أَلَّا نَعْبُدَ إِلَّا ٱللَّهَ وَلَا نُشْرِكَ بِهِۦ شَيْـًۭٔا وَلَا يَتَّخِذَ بَعْضُنَا بَعْضًا أَرْبَابًۭا مِّن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ ۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّوْا۟ فَقُولُوا۟ ٱشْهَدُوا۟ بِأَنَّا مُسْلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Say	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	 Muhammad - peace	
and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him),	 “O	 People	
given	 the	Book(s)!	 Come	 towards	a	word	
which	 is	 common	 between	 us	 and	 you,	
that	we	shall	worship	no	one	except	Allah,	
and	that	we	shall	not	ascribe	any	partner	
to	Him,	and	that	none	of	us	shall	take	one	
another	 as	 lords	 besides	 Allah”;	 then	 if	
they	 do	 not	 accept	 say,	 “Be	 witness	 that	
(only)	we	are	Muslims.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Tum	 farmao	 aey	 kitābiyoñ	 aise	 kalme	 ki	
taraf	 āao	 jo	 ham	 meiñ	 tum	 meiñ	 yaksāñ	
haiñ	yeh	ke	ibādat	na	kareiñ	magar	khuda	
ki	aur	us	ka	shareek	kisi	ko	na	kareiñ	aur	
ham	meiñ	koi	ek	doosre	ko	Rab	na	bana	le	
Allah	ke	siwa	phir	agar	woh	na	māneiñ	to	
keh	do	tum	gawah	raho	ke	ham	Musalman	
haiñ.

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَهْلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لِمَ تُحَآجُّونَ فِىٓ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَتِ ٱلتَّوْرَىٰةُ وَٱلْإِنجِيلُ إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعْدِهِۦٓ ۚ أَفَلَا تَعْقِلُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 given	 the	 Book(s)!	Why	 do	 you	
argue	about	 Ibrahim,	whereas	 the	Taurat	
(Torah)	 and	 the	 Injeel	 (Bible)	 were	 not	
sent	down	until	after	him?	So	do	you	not	
have	sense?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	Kitāb	 wālo!	Ibrāheem ke	 baare meiñ	
kyuñ	 jhagardte ho	 Taurāt-o-Injeel to	 na	
utri	magar	unke	b’ād	 to	 kiya	 tumheiñ	aql	
nahi!

arabicText: هَـٰٓأَنتُمْ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ حَـٰجَجْتُمْ فِيمَا لَكُم بِهِۦ عِلْمٌۭ فَلِمَ تُحَآجُّونَ فِيمَا لَيْسَ لَكُم بِهِۦ عِلْمٌۭ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ يَعْلَمُ وَأَنتُمْ لَا تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Listen!	This	was	what	you	argued	about	-
of	which	you	have	some	knowledge	- why	
do	 you	 then	 argue	 about	 the	 matter	 you	
do	not	have	any	knowledge	of?	And	Allah
knows	whereas	you	do	not	know.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Sunte	ho!	Yeh	jo	tum	ho	is	meiñ	jhagde	jis	
ka tumheiñ	 ilm	 tha	 to	 is	 meiñ	 kiyuñ	
jhagadte	ho	jis	ka	tumheiñ	ilm	hi	nahi	aur	
Allah	jānta	hai	aur	tum	nahi	jānte

arabicText: مَا كَانَ إِبْرَٰهِيمُ يَهُودِيًّۭا وَلَا نَصْرَانِيًّۭا وَلَـٰكِن كَانَ حَنِيفًۭا مُّسْلِمًۭا وَمَا كَانَ مِنَ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
romanUrduTranslationText:
Ibrāheem na	Yahūdi	they	na	Nasrāni	balke	
har	 bātil	 se	 juda	 Musalman	 the	 aur	
mushrikoñ	se	na	they

arabicText: إِنَّ أَوْلَى ٱلنَّاسِ بِإِبْرَٰهِيمَ لَلَّذِينَ ٱتَّبَعُوهُ وَهَـٰذَا ٱلنَّبِىُّ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ وَلِىُّ ٱلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Undoubtedly	among	all	mankind	who	have	 the	best	claim	 to	 Ibrahim	are	 those	who	 followed	
him,	and	 this	 Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	and	 the	 believers;	and	
Allah is	the	Guardian	of	the	believers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak	sab	logoñ	se	Ibrāheem ke	ziyāda	haqdār	woh	they	jo	un	ke	pairo	huwe	aur	yeh	Nabi	aur	
Imān	wāle	aur	Imān	wāloñ	ka	wāli	Allah	hai	.

arabicText: وَدَّت طَّآئِفَةٌۭ مِّنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لَوْ يُضِلُّونَكُمْ وَمَا يُضِلُّونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Undoubtedly	among	all	mankind	who	have	 the	best	claim	 to	 Ibrahim	are	 those	who	 followed	
him,	and	 this	 Prophet	(Muhammad - peace	 and	 blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	and	 the	 believers;	and	
Allah is	the	Guardian	of	the	believers.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Kitābiyoñ	ka	ek	giroh	dil	se	chāhta	hai	ke	kisi	tarah	tumheiñ	gumrah	kar	deiñ	aur	woh	apne	hi	
āp	ko	gumrah	karte	haiñ	aur	unheiñ	sha'oor	nhi

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَهْلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لِمَ تَكْفُرُونَ بِـَٔايَـٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَنتُمْ تَشْهَدُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 given	 the	 Book(s)!	 Why	 do	 you	 disbelieve	 in	 the	 signs of	 Allah,	 whereas	 you	
yourselves	are	witnesses?
romanUrduTranslationText: Aey	kitābiyoñ!	Allah	ki	Āyatoñ	se	kyuñ	kufr	karte	ho	halāñke	tum	khud	gawāh ho

arabicText: يَـٰٓأَهْلَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لِمَ تَلْبِسُونَ ٱلْحَقَّ بِٱلْبَـٰطِلِ وَتَكْتُمُونَ ٱلْحَقَّ وَأَنتُمْ تَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
O	 People	 given	 the	 Book(s)!	Why	 do	 you	
mix	 the	 truth	with	 falsehood	and	conceal	
the	truth,	whereas	you	know?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aey	 kitābiyoñ!	 Haq	 meiñ	 bātil	 kiyuñ	
milāte	 ho	 aur	 haq	 kiyuñ	 chupāte	 ho	
halāñke	tumheiñ	khabar	hai	.

arabicText: وَقَالَت طَّآئِفَةٌۭ مِّنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ ءَامِنُوا۟ بِٱلَّذِىٓ أُنزِلَ عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَجْهَ ٱلنَّهَارِ وَٱكْفُرُوٓا۟ ءَاخِرَهُۥ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَرْجِعُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	a	group	among	 the	 People	given	 the	
Book(s)	 said,	 “Believe	 in	 what	 has	 been	
sent	down	to	the	believers	in	the	morning	
and	deny	it	by	evening	- perhaps	they	(the	
Muslims)	may	turn	back	(disbelieve).”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 kitābiyoñ	 ka	 ek	 giroh	 bola	 woh	 jo	
Imān	 wāloñ	 par	 utra	 subah	 ko	 us	 par	
Imān	 lāo	 aur	 shām	 ko	 munkir	 ho	 jāo	
shāyad	woh	phir	jāyeiñ

arabicText: وَلَا تُؤْمِنُوٓا۟ إِلَّا لِمَن تَبِعَ دِينَكُمْ قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْهُدَىٰ هُدَى ٱللَّهِ أَن يُؤْتَىٰٓ أَحَدٌۭ مِّثْلَ مَآ أُوتِيتُمْ أَوْ يُحَآجُّوكُمْ عِندَ رَبِّكُمْ ۗ قُلْ إِنَّ ٱلْفَضْلَ بِيَدِ ٱللَّهِ يُؤْتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعٌ عَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
“And	do	not	believe	in	anyone	except	him	
who	 follows	 your	 religion”;	 say	 (O	 dear	
Prophet	Muhammad - peace	 and	 blessings	
be	upon	him),	“Only	Allah’s	guidance	is	the	
true	guidance”	- (so	why	not	believe	in	it)	if	
someone	 has	 been	 given	 similar	 to	 what	
was	 given	 to	 you,	 or	 if	 someone	 may	 be	
able	 to	 evidence	 it	 against	 you	 before	
your	 Lord;	 say	 (O	 dear	 Prophet	
Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him),	 “Undoubtedly	 the	 munificence	 lies	
only	 in	 Allah’s	 Hand	 (control);	 He	 may	
bestow	 upon	 whomever	 He	 wills;	 and	
Allah is	Most	Capable,	All	Knowing.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	yaqeen	na	lāo	magar	uska	jo	tumhāre	
deen	ka	pairo	ho	tum	farma	do	ke	Allah	hi	
ki	hidāyat	hidāyat	hai	(yaqeen	kāhe	ka	na
lāo)	iska	ke	kisi	ko	mile	jaisa	tumheiñ	mila	
ya	koi	tum	par	hujjat	la	sake	tumhāre	Rab	
ke	pās	tum	farma	do	ke	fazl	to	Allah	hi	ke	
hāth	 hai	 jise	 chāhe	 de	 aur	 Allah	 wus'at	
wāla	ilm	wāla	hai.

arabicText: يَخْتَصُّ بِرَحْمَتِهِۦ مَن يَشَآءُ ۗ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلْفَضْلِ ٱلْعَظِيمِ
englishTranslationText:
“He	 chooses	 by	His	mercy,	whomever	He	
wills;	 and	 Allah is	 the	 Owner	 of	 Great	
Munificence.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Apni	 rahmat	 se	 khās	 karta	 hai	jise	 chāhe	
aur	Allah	bade	fazl	wāla hai

arabicText: ۞ وَمِنْ أَهْلِ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ مَنْ إِن تَأْمَنْهُ بِقِنطَارٍۢ يُؤَدِّهِۦٓ إِلَيْكَ وَمِنْهُم مَّنْ إِن تَأْمَنْهُ بِدِينَارٍۢ لَّا يُؤَدِّهِۦٓ إِلَيْكَ إِلَّا مَا دُمْتَ عَلَيْهِ قَآئِمًۭا ۗ ذَٰلِكَ بِأَنَّهُمْ قَالُوا۟ لَيْسَ عَلَيْنَا فِى ٱلْأُمِّيِّـۧنَ سَبِيلٌۭ وَيَقُولُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلْكَذِبَ وَهُمْ يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
Among	 the	 People	 given	 the	 Book(s)	 is	
one	who,	if	 you	 trust	 him	with	 a	 heap	 of	
treasure,	will	return	it	to	you;	and	among	
them	 is	 one	 who,	 if	 you	 trust	 him	 with	
(just)	one	coin,	will	not	return	it	to	you	unless	you	constantly	stand	over	him	(keep	demanding);	
that	is	 because	 they	 say,	 “We	 are	 not	 obliged	in	 any	way,	in	 the	 case	 of	illiterates”;	 and	 they	
purposely	fabricate	lies	against	Allah.
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	kitābiyoñ	meiñ	koi	woh	hai	ke	agar	tu	
us	 ke	 pās	 ek	 dher	 amānat	 rakhe	 to	 woh	
tujhe	 ada karde	 ga	 aur	 un	 meiñ	 koi	 woh	
hai	 ke	 agar	 ek	 asharfi	 un	 ke	 pās	 amānat	
rakhe	 to	 woh	 tujhe	 pher	 kar	 na	 dega	
magar	jab	tak	tu	us	ke	sar	par	khada	rahe	
yeh	is	liye ke	woh	kahte	haiñ	ke	an-padho	
ke	 mu'āmle	 meiñ	 ham	 par	 koi	 muākhza	
nahi	aur	Allah	par	jān	boojh	kar	jhoot	bāndhte	haiñ.

arabicText: بَلَىٰ مَنْ أَوْفَىٰ بِعَهْدِهِۦ وَٱتَّقَىٰ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يُحِبُّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ
englishTranslationText:
Yes,	 why	 not?	 Whoever	 fulfilled	 his	 pledge	 and	 practised	 piety	- and	 indeed	 Allah loves	 the	
pious.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Hāñ	kiyuñ	nahi	jisne	apna	‘ahed	poora	kiya	aur	parhez-gāri	ki	aur	beshak	parhez-gār	Allah	ko	
khush	āate	haiñ.

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يَشْتَرُونَ بِعَهْدِ ٱللَّهِ وَأَيْمَـٰنِهِمْ ثَمَنًۭا قَلِيلًا أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ لَا خَلَـٰقَ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ وَلَا يُكَلِّمُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ وَلَا يَنظُرُ إِلَيْهِمْ يَوْمَ ٱلْقِيَـٰمَةِ وَلَا يُزَكِّيهِمْ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Those	who	accept	abject	prices	in	exchange	of	Allah’s	covenant	and	their	oaths,	do	not	have	a	
portion	in	the	Hereafter	- Allah will	neither	speak	to	them	nor	look	towards	them	on	the	Day	of	
Resurrection,	nor	will	He	purify	them;	and	for	them	is	a	painful	punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
woh	jo	Allah	ke	‘ahed	aur apni	qasmoñ	ko	badale	zaleel	dām	lete	haiñ	ākhirat	meiñ	unka	kuch	
hissa	nahi	aur	Allah	na	unse	bāt	kare	na	unki	taraf	nazar	farmāye	qiyāmat	ke	din	aur	na	unheiñ	
pāk	kare	aur	unke	liye	dard-nāk	azāb	hai

arabicText: وَإِنَّ مِنْهُمْ لَفَرِيقًۭا يَلْوُۥنَ أَلْسِنَتَهُم بِٱلْكِتَـٰبِ لِتَحْسَبُوهُ مِنَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَمَا هُوَ مِنَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَيَقُولُونَ هُوَ مِنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ وَمَا هُوَ مِنْ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ وَيَقُولُونَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ ٱلْكَذِبَ وَهُمْ يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	amongst	 them	are	 some	who	 distort	
(change	 words	 of)	 the	 Book	 with	 their	
tongues,	 so	 that	 you	 may	 think	 that	 this	
also	is	in	the	Book	whereas	it	is	not	in	the	
Book;	 and	 they	 say,	 “This	 is	 from	 Allah”	
whereas	 it	 is	 not	 from	 Allah;	 and	 they	
fabricate	lies	 against	Allah,	 whereas	 they	
know.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 un	 meiñ	 kuchh	 woh	 haiñ	 jo	 zabān	
pher	 kar	 kitāb	 meiñ	 mel	(milāwat)	 karte	
haiñ	ke	tum	samjho	yeh	bhi	kitāb	meiñ	hai	
aur	 woh	 kitāb	 meiñ	 nahi	 aur	 woh	 kahte	
haiñ	yeh	Allah	ke	pās	se	hai	aur	woh	Allah	
ke	 pās	 se	 nahi	 aur	 Allah	 par	 deeda	 wa	
dānista	jhoot	bāndhte	haiñ

arabicText: مَا كَانَ لِبَشَرٍ أَن يُؤْتِيَهُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَٱلْحُكْمَ وَٱلنُّبُوَّةَ ثُمَّ يَقُولَ لِلنَّاسِ كُونُوا۟ عِبَادًۭا لِّى مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَـٰكِن كُونُوا۟ رَبَّـٰنِيِّـۧنَ بِمَا كُنتُمْ تُعَلِّمُونَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبَ وَبِمَا كُنتُمْ تَدْرُسُونَ
englishTranslationText:
It	is	not	for	any	human	to	whom	Allah has	
given	 the	 Book	 and	 wisdom	 and	
Prophethood,	 that	 he	 should	 afterwards	
say	 to	 the	people,	“Leave	(the	worship	of)	
Allah and	 be	 my	 worshippers”	 - but	 he	
will	surely	say,	“Be	sincere	worshippers	of	
Allah,	 because	 you	 teach	 the	 Book	 and	
you	preach	from	it.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Kisi	 ādmi	 ka	 yeh	 haq	 nahi	 ke	 Allah	 usey	
Kitāb	 aur	 hukm	 wa Paighambari	 de	 phir	
woh	logoñ	 se	 kahe	 ke	Allah	 ko	 chord	 kar	
mere	 bande	 ho	 jāo	 is	 sabab	 se	 ke	 tum	
kitāb	 sikhāte	 ho	 aur	 is	 se	 ke	 tum	 dars	
karte	ho

arabicText: وَلَا يَأْمُرَكُمْ أَن تَتَّخِذُوا۟ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ وَٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ أَرْبَابًا ۗ أَيَأْمُرُكُم بِٱلْكُفْرِ بَعْدَ إِذْ أَنتُم مُّسْلِمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	nor	will	he	command	you	 to	appoint	
the	 angels	 and	 the	 Prophets	 as	 Gods;	
would	 he	 (a	 Prophet)	 command	 you	 to	
disbelieve	 after	 you	 have	 become	
Muslims?
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	 na	 tumheiñ	 yeh	 hukm	 dega	 ke	
Firishtoñ	 aur	 Paighambaroñ	 ko	 khuda	
thahra	lo; kya	tumheiñ	kufr	ka	hukm	dega	
b’ād	iske	ke	tum	Musalman	ho	liye?

arabicText: وَإِذْ أَخَذَ ٱللَّهُ مِيثَـٰقَ ٱلنَّبِيِّـۧنَ لَمَآ ءَاتَيْتُكُم مِّن كِتَـٰبٍۢ وَحِكْمَةٍۢ ثُمَّ جَآءَكُمْ رَسُولٌۭ مُّصَدِّقٌۭ لِّمَا مَعَكُمْ لَتُؤْمِنُنَّ بِهِۦ وَلَتَنصُرُنَّهُۥ ۚ قَالَ ءَأَقْرَرْتُمْ وَأَخَذْتُمْ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكُمْ إِصْرِى ۖ قَالُوٓا۟ أَقْرَرْنَا ۚ قَالَ فَٱشْهَدُوا۟ وَأَنَا۠ مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّـٰهِدِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 remember	 when	 Allah took	 a	
covenant	from	the	Prophets;	“If	I	give	you	
the	 Book	 and	 knowledge	 and	 the	
(promised)	 Noble	 Messenger	 (Prophet	
Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him)	comes	 to	 you,	 confirming	 the	Books	
you	 possess,	 you	 shall	 positively,	
definitely	believe	in	him	and	you	shall	positively,	definitely	help	him”;	He	said, “Do	you	agree,	
and	accept	My	binding	responsibility	in	 this	matter?”	They	all	answered,	“We	agree”;	He	said,	
“Then	bear	witness	amongst	yourselves,	and	I	Myself	am	a	witness	with	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	 yād	 karo	 jab	 Allah	 ne	 Paighambaroñ	
se	 un	 ka	 ‘ahed	 liya	 jo	 maiñ	 tum	 ko	 kitāb	
aur	 hikmat	 dooñ	 phir	 tashreef	 lāye	
tumhāre	 pās	 woh	 Rasool	 ke	 tumhāri	
kitāboñ	ki	tasdeeq	farmāye	to	tum	zaroor	
zaroor	us	par	Imān	lāna	aur	zaroor	zaroor	
us	 ki	madad	 karna,	 farmāya:	 kyuñ	 tumne	
iqrār	kiya	aur	us	par	mera	bhāri	zimma	liya?	Sab	ne	arz	ki	ham	ne	iqrār	kiya,	 farmāya:	 to	ek	
doosre	par	gawah	ho	jāo	aur	maiñ	āap	tumhāre	sath	gawāhoñ	meiñ	hooñ

arabicText: فَمَن تَوَلَّىٰ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْفَـٰسِقُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	 remember	 when	 Allah took	 a	
covenant	from	the	Prophets;	“If	I	give	you	
the	 Book	 and	 knowledge	 and	 the	
(promised)	 Noble	 Messenger	 (Prophet	
Muhammad - peace	and	blessings	be	upon	
him)	comes	 to	 you,	 confirming	 the	Books	
you	 possess,	 you	 shall	 positively,	
definitely	believe	in	him	and	you	shall	positively,	definitely	help	him”;	He	said, “Do	you	agree,	
and	accept	My	binding	responsibility	in	 this	matter?”	They	all	answered,	“We	agree”;	He	said,	
“Then	bear	witness	amongst	yourselves,	and	I	Myself	am	a	witness	with	you.”
romanUrduTranslationText:
. Aur	 yād	 karo	 jab	 Allah	 ne	 Paighambaroñ	
se	 un	 ka	 ‘ahed	 liya	 jo	 maiñ	 tum	 ko	 kitāb	
aur	 hikmat	 dooñ	 phir	 tashreef	 lāye	
tumhāre	 pās	 woh	 Rasool	 ke	 tumhāri	
kitāboñ	ki	tasdeeq	farmāye	to	tum	zaroor	
zaroor	us	par	Imān	lāna	aur	zaroor	zaroor	
us	 ki	madad	 karna,	 farmāya:	 kyuñ	 tumne	
iqrār	kiya	aur	us	par	mera	bhāri	zimma	liya?	Sab	ne	arz	ki	ham	ne	iqrār	kiya,	 farmāya:	 to	ek	
doosre	par	gawah	ho	jāo	aur	maiñ	āap	tumhāre	sath	gawāhoñ	meiñ	hooñ
